packages.title: Birthday
packages.description1: Celebrate your special day with our comprehensive birthday package. Includes decorations, catering, and entertainment. Tailored themes to match your style. Let us make your birthday unforgettable!

packages.title: Wedding
packages.description1: Create your dream wedding with our all-inclusive package. Elegant venue setup, exquisite catering, and personalized decor. Professional coordination to ensure a seamless event. Make your big day magical!

packages.title: Reception
packages.description1: Host a stunning reception with our tailored package. Includes stylish venue, gourmet catering, and live entertainment. Attention to every detail for a memorable celebration. Your guests will be impressed!

packages.title: Success Party
packages.description1: Celebrate achievements with our success party package. Vibrant decor, delicious food, and exciting activities. Perfect for corporate or personal milestones. Make your success shine with us!

packages.title: Ear Piercing Ceremony
packages.description1: Mark this special occasion with our ear piercing ceremony package. Elegant decorations, traditional rituals, and sumptuous catering. Personalized touches to honor your culture. Celebrate this milestone beautifully!

packages.title: Baby Shower
packages.description: Celebrate the joy of a new arrival.
packages.description1: Celebrate the joy of a new arrival with our baby shower package. Adorable decorations, themed games, and delicious treats. Customized to your preferences. Make this special day even more memorable!

packages.title: Naming Ceremony
packages.description1: Welcome your little one with our naming ceremony package. Traditional setup, delightful catering, and meaningful rituals. Ensuring a heartfelt celebration. Cherish this precious moment with family and friends!

packages.title: Office Function
packages.description1: Host a successful office function with our tailored package. Professional setup, catering, and AV support. Ideal for conferences, meetings, or parties. Impress your colleagues with a seamless event!
